The photos and claim were shared on Face: with a specific post garnering almost 300 shares since its publication on February 4, 2020.
The Urdu caption of the post warned abou: 3. The expert from Pakistan's National Institute of Health stated that there is no evidence of the coronavirus being found in chickens in Pakistan, dismissing the claim.
The Pakistan Poultry Association: a private organization of farmers, also refuted the claim as baseless propaganda and stated that the coronavirus has not been reported in chicken in the country.
